data.description:
## BLOCKER for T-20251222-145525-445df343

This task MUST be completed before any deletion of legacy code.

### Background
Audit on 2025-12-24 discovered that the migration from GoTProjectManager to TransactionalGoTAdapter is INCOMPLETE. The `infer` CLI command is currently BROKEN.

### Missing Methods in TransactionalGoTAdapter
1. `infer_edges_from_commit(commit_message, files_changed)` - Infers task edges from commit messages
2. `infer_edges_from_recent_commits(count)` - Batch inference from git history

### Current Error
```
python scripts/got_utils.py infer --message "test"
AttributeError: 'TransactionalGoTAdapter' object has no attribute 'infer_edges_from_commit'
```

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Port infer_edges_from_commit() to TransactionalGoTAdapter
- [ ] Port infer_edges_from_recent_commits() to TransactionalGoTAdapter
- [ ] Verify `infer` CLI command works
- [ ] Add integration tests for infer command
- [ ] Audit ALL other CLI commands for similar gaps

### Reference
- Decision: D-20251224-052658-40924db3
- Blocked task: T-20251222-145525-445df343
- Source of methods: scripts/got_utils.py lines 3732-3853 (GoTProjectManager)

properties.retrospective: Fixed infer_edges methods in TransactionalGoTAdapter. Commit 4dcaa50a. CLI infer command now works. Audited other commands - all passing.

data.title: Complete TransactionalGoTAdapter migration before deletion
